channel.title: [317] DropScape [317] Development Team
channel.description:
I will begin coding my new server, DroppedScape, next weekend. I hope I can get 1-2 other coders willing to help me. I have big plans, knowing what people want. I am still deciding whether I'm going to have a pickup server or not. The reason I need a development team is because though I have good ideas, I cannot always use them as I only know the basics to coding. Any help would be great. Here is what I need:
CODERS Me -- --
HOSTER Temporarily, Me
SITE OWNER Temporarily, Me
The website is currently *. Any questions? Email * Interested? email me!

item.title: [317] DropScape [317] Development Team
item.dc:creator: @r0flzzz r0flzzz
item.description:
@r0flzzz wrote:

[quote=“aquikzebra, post:6, topic:359061”]Thanks

Sorry for being an ass Just so many kids these days…[/quote]

I’m a kid XD But I know what you mean.

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:1, topic:359221”]I could make good forums for you what kind were you interested in? add

my msn allisonabcde12345@live.com if you want just leave a message mainly use for conference calls lol[/quote]

I have a decent temporary forums, but alright. I don’t get on MSN a lot, I guess I shoulld start lol. Check out droppedscape.webs.com to see forums I got atm. If you can make a better one and I havn’t gotton back to you, email me a bunch XD.

@Everyone
I need follow ups! So far no one has emailed me or anything. If you really are interested, email me or post on the temportaty forums! Thanks. (:

Read full topic

item.title: [317] DropScape [317] Development Team
item.dc:creator: @r0flzzz r0flzzz
item.description:
@r0flzzz wrote:

Yeah, I can buy a VPS once a few people start. I would also need donations to keep it up. But I can host a lot of the time without it too. Anyways, like I said, EMAIL ME AT MATT.WAFFLES@GMAIL.COM, chances are, I won’t check back here and you guys won’t get any replies. I will start it up next weekend.

Read full topic
